name: updateProfile
description:
Updates the user profile of the authenticated user
OauthScopes: WRITE_USER_PROFILE

firstname.description: The new firstname of the user

jobTitle.description: The new job title of the user

lastname.description: The new lastname of the user

locale.description: The new locale of the user. One of EN_US, DE_DE, EN_GB, ES_ES, FR_FR, IT_IT, RU_RU, ZH_HANS_CN.

$ul: **avatar**: The URL of the small avatar picture.
**avatarLarge**: The URL of the large avatar picture.
**company**: The name of the user's company
**emailAddress**: The primary email address of the user
**emailAddresses**: additional email addresses of the user
**firstName**: The first name of the user
**jobTitle**: The job title of the user
**lastName**: The last name of the user
**locale**: The locale of the user. (E.g. en-US, de-DE)
**phoneNumber**: provisioned phone number of the user
**phoneNumbers**: additional phone numbers of the user
**userState**: The state of the user, e.g. deleted
